headline: Everton Women sign former Liverpool goalkeeper
summary: Everton have signed goalkeeper Rylee Foster from A-League side Wellington Phoenix on a short-term contract until January 2025. The 26-year-old Canadian signed for Liverpool in 2020 and made 19 appearances for Wellington before departing this […]

headline: Birmingham City Women’s Jade Pennock joins Central Coast Mariners on loan
summary: Birmingham City forward Jade Pennock has joined A-League Women’s side Central Coast Mariners on a season-long loan. Pennock joined the Blues in the summer of 2021 from Sheffield United and has so far made 70 […]

headline: ‘We will never sign that kind of contract any more’ – Spurs coach Robert Vilahamn on Celin Bizet departure

headline: Wales Women’s players of 70s & 80s to receive official FAW caps
summary: The FA of Wales is recognising and celebrating the trailblazing Wales players that represented the women’s national team in the 1970s and 1980s, prior to coming under FAW affiliation.  The cap presentation will take place […]

headline: Stephen Kirby appointed Bristol City Women’s new head coach
